oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bobby Braddock -- Poets and Prophets program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Songwriter and Country Music Hall of Fame member Bobby Braddock interviewed about his life and career at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's Ford Theater. Interview conducted in front of a live audience by museum staff member Michael Gray.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby Braddock; Michael Gray
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Contains interview, audio, audio from video and solo song performances. Live performances include "I Wanna Talk About Me", "I'm Glad He Had The Nerve", He Stopped Loving Her Today"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Braddock, Bobby ; Gray, Michael; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
